Name: Language in Migration
Description:
This corpus is a representation of authentic spoken Czech and German.
It contains transcriptions of informal speech (private environment, spontaneity, unpreparedness etc.) by Czech-German bilingual speakers born in Czechoslovakia around 1955 and who departed for Germany after becoming 12 years old. The corpus is composed of interviews conducted from 2018â€“2020 with 20 speakers on language biographies and narrated in Czech and German respectively.
The corpus is available for download from LINDAT and for online browsing through the KonText concordancer.
